channel.title: U.S. Navy News Top Stories
channel.description: These are the Navy News top stories available on www.navy.mil

item.title: HSC—25 Assists in Rescue of Stranded Boaters Near Guam
item.description: Sailors from Helicopter Sea Combat Squadron (HSC) 25, U.S. Coast Guard Sector Guam and rescue crews from Rota, Northern Mariana Islands, 40 nautical miles north—northeast of the U.S. territory of Guam, recovered three stranded boaters a mile offshore near the village of Songsong Feb. 3.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)

item.title: CNO: Here's What We Need for the Future Force
item.description: Chief of Naval Operations (CNO) Adm. Jonathan Greenert outlined his thoughts Feb. 4 on three science and technology objectives for the Navy and Marine Corps of the future, at the Naval Future Force Science and Technology (S&T) EXPO in Washington, D.C.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)

item.title: Making Sailors 'SAFFiR' — Navy Unveils Firefighting Robot Prototype at Naval Tech EXPO
item.description: Scientists unveiled a firefighting robot prototype Feb. 4 at the Naval Future Force Science & Technology EXPO, revealing details about its successful demonstrations last fall.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)

item.title: CNP Hosts Live All Hands Call
item.description: The Chief of Naval Personnel (CNP) talked with Sailors around the world during an all—hands call broadcast live from Defense Media Activity at Fort Meade, Md., Feb. 3.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)

item.title: NAVSEA Employees Return to Navy Yard Home
item.description: NAVSEA Commander Vice Adm. William Hilarides officially opened the doors to NAVSEA's newly renovated workplace during a christening ceremony held Feb. 2 on the steps of the Humphreys Building, Building 197, at the Washington Navy Yard.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)

item.title: See the Future: Naval EXPO Coming to Washington, D.C.
item.description: For the first time ever, the general public will be admitted free to the Naval Future Force Science and Technology EXPO general exhibit hall Feb. 4—5 where they will be able to see the Electromagnetic Railgun, an autonomous swarmboat, a firefighting robot and much more.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)

item.title: SECNAV Completes Visit to Paraguay
item.description: Secretary of the Navy (SECNAV) Ray Mabus completed a visit to Paraguay Jan. 29 during which he met with Republic of Paraguay President Horacio Cartes to discuss the relationship between the Department of the Navy and Paraguay's military.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)

item.title: Senior Enlisted Continuation Board Results Released to Command Triads
item.description: The board results for the performance—based Fiscal Year (FY) 2015 Senior Enlisted Continuation Board (SECB) have been approved and posted on BUPERS online (BOL) for command triads, Jan. 27.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)

item.title: Navy Installations to Conduct Exercise Solid Curtain—Citadel Shield 2015
item.description: Commander, U.S. Fleet Forces (USFF) and Commander, Navy Installations Command (CNIC) will conduct Exercise Solid Curtain—Citadel Shield 2015 (SC—CS15) Feb. 2—13 on Navy installations located in the continental United States.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)

item.title: Naval Air Forces Holds Change of Command
item.description: Commander, Naval Air Forces (CNAF) held a change of command ceremony aboard the aircraft carrier USS John C. Stennis (CVN 74) at Naval Air Station North Island Jan. 22.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)

item.title: Navy Debuts Newest Ad
item.description: Navy's latest recruiting commercial "Pin Map" will debut Jan. 23 to TV and web audiences worldwide.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)

item.title: SECNAV Establishes Task Force Innovation
item.description: Secretary of the Navy (SECNAV) Ray Mabus announced the establishment of Task Force Innovation (TFI) within the Department of the Navy Jan. 22.
item.author: navynewsservice@dma.mil (Navy News Desk)
